T03D3794:154b-36: nyes par spyod pa thams cad sbyin pa dang tshul
T03D3794:154b-37: khrims la sogs pa la 'god par 'dod pas shes

T03D3794:154b-39: nan tan du bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa

T03D3794:155a-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rgyas pa ste /
T03D3794:155a-2: gzhan gyi don bstan pa yin no //

T03D3794:155a-4: rgyal ba'i yum zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos

T03D3794:155a-28: 'dun pa dang bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa

T03D3794:155a-31: sbyor ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa la lus la sogs pa'i bya ba'o //
T03D3794:155a-32: sbyin pa ni slong ba rnams la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu ster ba'o //
T03D3794:155a-33: tshul khrims ni legs par spyod pa'i las rnams so //
T03D3794:155a-34: bzod pa ni gzhan gyi gnod pa shes pa rnag nus pa'o //
T03D3794:155a-35: brtson 'grus ni dge ba'i las rnams la spro ba'o //
T03D3794:155a-36: bsam gtan ni sems rtse cig pa'o //
T03D3794:155a-37: shes rab ni thos pa la sogs pa'i shes pa'o //
T03D3794:155a-38: thams mkhas pa ni 'tshang rgya ba nyid kyi thabs
T03D3794:155a-39: la sems ma zhum pa la sogs pa la bya

T03D3794:155b-2: mngon par shes pa ni kun shes pa ste /

T03D3794:156a-4: de'i dngos po ni ma chags pa la sogs pa yod pa'o //

T03D3794:156a-6: rgya ba nyid kyi bar du gzhan du mi 'gyur

T03D3794:156b-13: gdul bya ste nyan thos la sogs pa'i mya ngan
T03D3794:156b-14: las 'das pa smin par byed pa ni yongs su

T03D3794:170b-17: rtogs pa yi ni chos drug ste //
T03D3794:170b-18: zhes bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba'i chos rnam
T03D3794:170b-19: pa drug gi rten zhes bya ba gzhi la ni
T03D3794:170b-20: byang chub sems dpa' rgyud kyi rigs yin no zhes

T03D3794:170b-22: rten pa'i rtogs par bya ba'i chos gang zhig yin
T03D3794:170b-24: der de bskyed pa'i rim gyis chos de bstan par
T03D3794:170b-25: bya ba'i phyir gnyen po dang ni zhes bya ba
T03D3794:170b-27: gnyen po dang ni spong ba dang //
T03D3794:170b-28: zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i rab kyi mthar thug
T03D3794:170b-29: pa la gnas pa'i sems kyi khyad par dang des
T03D3794:170b-30: spang bar bya ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag go
T03D3794:170b-31: // gnyen po dang mi mthun pa de dag spangs pa ste /
T03D3794:170b-32: de dag yongs su gtugs pa ni de'i rnam par rtog pa zad pa'o //
T03D3794:170b-33: shes rab dang snying brtser bcas pa ni shes rab dang snying rje dag go //
T03D3794:170b-34: slob ma thun mong min nyid dang //
T03D3794:170b-35: zhes bya ba ni nyan thos la sogs pa dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so //
T03D3794:170b-36: gzhan gyi don gyi go rims dang //
T03D3794:170b-37: zhes bya ba ni de'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum ston pa'i rim pa'o //
T03D3794:170b-38: ye shes rtsol ba mi mnga' bar //
T03D3794:170b-39: zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don gyi ye shes
T03D3794:170b-40: rang gi ngang gis skye ba yin pa'i phyir ro
T03D3794:171a-0: // gang sngar gyi rten bshad pa dang bcas par 'grel pa las @171a * //
T03D3794:171a-1: bstan pa ni re zhig dang por zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T03D3794:171a-2: re zhig dang por 'jig rten pa'i nges par 'byed
T03D3794:171a-3: pa'i cha dang mthun pa dro ba la sogs pa
T03D3794:171a-4: skye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3794:171a-5: de'i 'og tu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mthong ba'i
T03D3794:171a-6: lam dang bsgom pa'i lam skye ba yin pa'i phyir
T03D3794:171a-7: ro // de'i 'og tu de dag skyes pa'i stobs
T03D3794:171a-8: kyis zhes bya ba dro ba la sogs pa dang
T03D3794:171a-9: mthong ba la sogs pa'i lam skye ba'i mthus rkun
T03D3794:171a-10: po phyung ba dang sgo 'phar bcad pa lta bur
T03D3794:171a-11: zhes bya ba skad cig ma gang kho na ji
T03D3794:171a-12: ltar rkun ma gcig bton nas skad cig ma de
T03D3794:171a-13: nyid kho na la gzhan gang yin pa de mi
T03D3794:171a-14: 'jug par bya ba'i phyir sgo 'phar bcad pa ste
T03D3794:171a-15: ro // / de 'jug pa'i sgo gcod pa dang
T03D3794:171a-16: 'dra bar dus mnyam du gnyen po'i phyogs ma lus

T03D3794:171a-18: dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs spang bar bya bas nyon
T03D3794:171a-19: mongs pa'i sems kyis khyad par de dag go rims
T03D3794:171a-20: bzhin du skye ba dang 'gag pa 'byung ba yin
T03D3794:171a-21: ro // / pa'i phyir te / gnyen po dang ni spong ba dang //
T03D3794:171a-22: zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no //
T03D3794:171a-23: de'i 'og tu de dag mi dmigs pas zhes bya
T03D3794:171a-24: ba dmigs par bya ba'i bdag nyid yang dag par
T03D3794:171a-25: na stong pa nyid yin pas gnyen po dang mi
T03D3794:171a-26: mthun pa'i phyogs skye ba dang 'gog pa dang nye
T03D3794:171a-27: bar dmigs pas skye ba dang 'gog pa dang gnyen
T03D3794:171a-28: po skye ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'jig pa de
T03D3794:171a-29: dag dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
T03D3794:171a-30: nyon mongs pa'i bsam pa spangs pas bdag la yang
T03D3794:171a-31: dag pa'i bsam pa skyes so zhes kun du rtog
T03D3794:171a-32: pa de spangs pa skye ba yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3794:171a-33: de dag yongs su gtugs pa dang //
T03D3794:171a-35: de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas su gyur nas gzhan gyi
T03D3794:171a-36: don bya'o zhes sngon gyi smon lam dang de la
T03D3794:171a-37: sbyin pa la sogs pa thabs la mkhas pa gang
T03D3794:171a-38: yin pa ste / sems mi 'gong ba nyid la
T03D3794:171a-39: sogs pa de'i stobs kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan
T03D3794:171a-40: las 'das pa la mi gnas shing srid pa dang
T03D3794:171a-41: zhi ba la mi gnas pa de'i mtshan nyid ste
T03D3794:171a-42: de'i bdag nyid can gyi shes rab dang snying rje
T03D3794:171a-43: dag gis shes rab dang thabs kyi ye shes skye
T03D3794:171b-0: yin pa ste / @171b ba'i phyir // shes rab snying brtser bcas pa dang //
T03D3794:171b-2: de'i 'og tu de dag skyes pas zhes bya ba
T03D3794:171b-3: shes rab dang thabs kyi ye shes gnyis skyes pas
T03D3794:171b-4: nyan thos la sogs pa dang thun mongs ma yin
T03D3794:171b-5: pa ste / chos gang nyan thos dang rang sangs
T03D3794:171b-6: rgyas dang mnyam pa ma yin ba stobs bcu la
T03D3794:171b-7: sogs pa de skye ba'i phyir //
T03D3794:171b-8: slob ma thun mong min nyid dang //
T03D3794:171b-10: de'i 'og tu bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T03D3794:171b-11: gdul bya rnams kyi spyod pa las ma 'das pas
T03D3794:171b-12: bzhugs pa la sogs pa la ldem por dgongs pa'i
T03D3794:171b-13: sgo nas zhes bya ba gal te dang por chos
T03D3794:171b-14: dang gang zag la bdag med pa thos pas skrag
T03D3794:171b-15: nas mu stegs pa'i lta ba nyid la gnas par
T03D3794:171b-16: 'gyur bas snying rjes bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar
T03D3794:171b-17: mchod sbyin la sogs pa la srog gcod pa la
T03D3794:171b-18: sogs pa dang thog ma med pa'i dus na goms
T03D3794:171b-19: pa'i rtag pa dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lta
T03D3794:171b-20: ba las bzlog nas theg pa gnyis las gsungs pa'i
T03D3794:171b-21: dge ba bcu'i gzhi dang mi rtag pa la sogs
T03D3794:171b-22: pa'i lta ba la bcug cing ngal so ba sngon
T03D3794:171b-23: du 'gro bas theg pa chen po la gzhag pa'i
T03D3794:171b-24: bsam pa'i thabs kyis de ltar theg pa gsum gyi
T03D3794:171b-25: lam la bkod pa gang yin pa de'i mtshan nyid
T03D3794:171b-26: kyis gzhan gyi don gyi go rims bzhin du de
T03D3794:171b-28: gzhan gyi don gyi go rims dang //
T03D3794:171b-30: de'i 'og tu 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du
T03D3794:171b-31: phyi'i mtshan ma dang 'bad pa dag stong pa nyid
T03D3794:171b-32: yin pa'i phyir mtshan ma med cing lhun gyis grub
T03D3794:171b-33: par gzhan gyi don gyi ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir
T03D3794:171b-34: / ye shes rtsol ba mi mnga' bar //
T03D3794:171b-35: zhes bya bar bshad pa yin no //
T03D3794:171b-36: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T03D3794:171b-37: byang chub sems dpa' ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar
T03D3794:171b-38: chos thams cad la zhen pa med pa nyid du
T03D3794:171b-40: ji ltar yang dag par na rten yod pa yin te /
T03D3794:171b-41: de ni mi rigs so zhes rtog pa la kun
T03D3794:171b-42: rdzob tu gtan la dbab pa ni bsgrub pa'i chos
T03D3794:171b-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te
T03D3794:171b-44: / bsgrub pa'i chos ni sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3794:172a-0: de'i gnas skabs kyi dbye ba ni gdul bya'i bye brag las rang bzhin @172a * //
T03D3794:172a-2: dbye ba des yang dag par na de las gzhan
T03D3794:172a-3: pa'i rang bzhin mi rigs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi
T03D3794:172a-4: ngo bo nyid kho na ji skad du bshad pa'i
T03D3794:172a-5: chos kyi gzhir gyur pa yin te /
T03D3794:172a-6: gnyen po dang ni spong ba dang //
T03D3794:172a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la chos drug gi rten yin no //
T03D3794:172a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa bcu gsum la rigs zhes bstan to //
T03D3794:172a-9: zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i tshig tu na yon
T03D3794:172a-10: tan bskyed pa'i don gyis na kun rdzob tu rigs
T03D3794:172a-11: zhes bya'o zhes yum las bshad do //
T03D3794:172a-12: chos kyi dbyings la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T03D3794:172a-13: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed snga
T03D3794:172a-14: mas ni phyogs snga ma ston pa'i zur gyis rnam
T03D3794:172a-15: par 'byed pa ni gal te zhes bya ba la
T03D3794:172a-16: sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T03D3794:172a-17: yang dag par na de las gzhan pa'i rgyu yod
T03D3794:172a-18: par mi 'thad pas chos kyi dbyings kho na ste
T03D3794:172a-19: / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid 'phags pa'i
T03D3794:172a-20: chos rtogs par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba stobs bcu

T03D3794:172a-22: / phyir ro // gal te de'i bdag nyid can gyi //
T03D3794:172a-23: zhes bya ba chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid can no //
T03D3794:172a-24: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni stobs bcu la sogs pa'o //
T03D3794:172a-25: byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin du gnas pa zhes
T03D3794:172a-26: bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa med pas
T03D3794:172a-27: shes pa tsam gyi tshul lo //
T03D3794:172a-28: rigs ni chos nyid du brtags pa'o //

T03D3794:172a-30: zhes bya ba ni de'i tshe chos kyi dbyings la dbye ba med pa las cir 'gyur zhen /
T03D3794:172a-31: 'di ni rang bzhin gyis gnas pa yin te /
T03D3794:172a-32: thog ma med pa'i dus nas brgyud pa'i chos nyid las thob pa yin la /
T03D3794:172a-33: 'di ni tshogs pa las byung ba yin te /
T03D3794:172a-34: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba goms pa las thob pa yin no //
T03D3794:172a-35: 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su nges pa yin te /
T03D3794:172a-36: rkyen chen pos kyang bzlog par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3794:172a-37: 'di ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i rigs ma nges pa yin te /
T03D3794:172a-38: rkyen gyis bzlog tu 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir rigs
T03D3794:172a-39: tha dad pa zhes bya bar rigs pa ma yin
T03D3794:172b-0: no // de ltar na @172b byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3794:172b-1: kho na ma yin no zhes bya ba byang chub
T03D3794:172b-2: sems 'ba' zhig rigs yin no zhes bya ba mi
T03D3794:172b-3: no // rigs te / nyan thos la sogs pa'i
T03D3794:172b-4: rigs kyang rigs nyid du 'dir 'dod pa yin pa'i
T03D3794:172b-5: phyir ro zhes bya ba'i rgol ba po gzhan gyi
T03D3794:172b-6: bsam pa yin no snyam pa zhes bya ba de
T03D3794:172b-7: ltar skye bo blo dman pa lung mngon par mi
T03D3794:172b-8: shes pa de rnams kyi ngor zhes bya ba la
T03D3794:172b-9: brtse ba'i dbang gis de mi shes pa bsal bar
T03D3794:172b-10: bya ba'i phyir dogs pa bsu ba sngar gsungs shing
T03D3794:172b-11: rgol ba bslangs nas bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad
T03D3794:172b-12: pa gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T03D3794:172b-13: de la rgol ba'i don phyed snga ma'i lan ni
T03D3794:172b-14: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa
T03D3794:172b-15: yin te / nyan thos kyi theg pa la sogs
T03D3794:172b-16: pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam
T03D3794:172b-17: ste de rtogs pa'i rim gyis zhes bya ba ni

T03D3794:172b-19: ltar te ji lta bar dmigs pa bzhin du byang
T03D3794:172b-20: chub sems dpas chos kyi dbyings la zhes bya ba
T03D3794:172b-21: yin te / ni lhag ma'o // de bzhin du

T03D3794:172b-23: ba'i phyir dmigs par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3794:172b-24: yin te / ni lhag ma'o // par sbyar ro // des cir 'gyur zhe na /
T03D3794:172b-25: rigs nyid du tha snyad 'dogs so zhes bya ba
T03D3794:172b-26: byang chub sems dpa' kho na nyan thos la sogs
T03D3794:172b-27: pa'i rigs su tha snyad du byed do //
T03D3794:172b-29: chos kyi dbyings kho na rgyur gyur par rnam par gzhag pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T03D3794:172b-30: yang dag par na de las gzhan pa'i rgyu yod
T03D3794:172b-31: par mi 'thad pas theg pa gsum gyis rigs kyi
T03D3794:172b-32: rgyu nyid byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi
T03D3794:172b-33: bdag nyid kho na yin par mdo sde las bstan
T03D3794:172b-34: pa'i phyir lung las chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
T03D3794:172b-35: byang chub sems dpa'i rgyur byas nas spyir theg pa
T03D3794:172b-36: gsum 'bras bu yin pa la brten te /
T03D3794:172b-37: ji ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs
T03D3794:172b-38: rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du byang chub sems
T03D3794:172b-39: dpa'i gnas skabs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs shes

T03D3794:173a-0: theg pa gsum dbyer med pa'i phyogs @173a * //
T03D3794:173a-1: ltar na yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3794:173a-2: theg pa gnyis khas blangs pa de rigs pa'i dpes
T03D3794:173a-3: byang chub sems dpa' rigs su rnam par gzhag pa
T03D3794:173a-4: gang yin pa de'i phyir dpe ma grub pa'i dogs
T03D3794:173a-5: pa mi bya'o // lan cig kyang zhes bya ba
T03D3794:173a-6: la sogs pa la lan gzhan du gsungs te zhes
T03D3794:173a-7: bya ba ni yang dag par na rten dang brten
T03D3794:173a-8: pa po'i dngos po yod pa ma yin na yang
T03D3794:173a-9: chos kyi dbyings thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi
T03D3794:173a-10: phyir theg pa gsum po mngon sum du bya ba'i
T03D3794:173a-11: phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid la sogs pa'i
T03D3794:173a-12: yon tan brten pa po nyid du yongs su brtags
T03D3794:173a-13: pa mi bya'o // nas / byang chub sems dpa'i
T03D3794:173a-14: rigs yin par rnam par gzhag pa'i skabs su theg
T03D3794:173a-15: pa gsum gyi rigs su rnam par gzhag pa tshigs
T03D3794:173a-16: su bcad pa phyed 'og mas lan btab pa ni
T03D3794:173a-17: brten pa'i chos kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3794:173a-19: lung las 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o //
T03D3794:173a-20: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang po kho nar rigs brjod par bya ba yin te sems bskyed pa dang /
T03D3794:173a-21: thar pa dang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun
T03D3794:173a-22: pa rnams ni de sngon du 'gro ba ma yin
T03D3794:173a-23: nam ji ltar na de ltar bshad /
T03D3794:173a-24: bden mod kyi 'di ni don gyi go rims yin la 'di yang bstan pa'i go rims yin te /
T03D3794:173a-25: 'bras bu gang yin pa bstan nas de'i 'og tu rgyu bstan pa yin pas nyes pa med do //
T03D3794:173a-26: ji skad du bshad pa'i bsgrub pa ste sems bskyed
T03D3794:173a-27: pa la sogs par mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du
T03D3794:173a-28: sngar bshad pa'o // de'i rten du gyur ba zhes
T03D3794:173a-29: bya ba la sogs pa la dmigs pa zhes bya
T03D3794:173a-30: ba la sogs pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i don ni
T03D3794:173a-31: re zhig dang por zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3794:173a-33: dang por sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni thog mar
T03D3794:173a-34: nyan thos la sogs pa dang thun mong du bshad
T03D3794:173a-35: pa dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du
T03D3794:173a-36: ma bstan pa ste blang bar bya ba dang dor
T03D3794:173a-37: bar bya ba dang btang snyoms su bya ba'i gnas
T03D3794:173a-38: rnams so // gang yin zhe na /
T03D3794:173a-39: go rims bzhin du dge sbyong gi tshul nyid dang srog gcod pa nyid dang /
T03D3794:173b-0: lung du ma bstan pa'i lus kyi las la sogs @173b pa zhes bya ba la /
T03D3794:173b-1: dge sbyong gi tshul ni dri ma med pa'i lam dang /
T03D3794:173b-2: bsam bzhin du 'khrul pa med par gzhan gyi srog
T03D3794:173b-3: gcod pa dang shes bzhin ma yin pa'i lus kyi
T03D3794:173b-4: nyes par spyod pa'i las rnams so //
T03D3794:173b-5: sogs pa'i sgra ni re re zhing sbyar te /
T03D3794:173b-7: ma byin par len pa dang /
T03D3794:173b-8: ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i las la sogs pa ste /
T03D3794:173b-9: chos gsum po de dag go //
T03D3794:173b-10: de'i 'og tu de dag nyid ces bya ba sngar bshad pa rnams so //
T03D3794:173b-11: lhag ma rnams zhes bya ba sa bon rul ba
T03D3794:173b-12: dang 'dra ba nyid kyis na lung du ma bstan
T03D3794:173b-13: pa dor la gang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i
T03D3794:173b-14: chos gang yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa
T03D3794:173b-15: la sogs pa rnam pa gnyis su dbye ba bzhi
T03D3794:173b-16: nyid kyis zhes bya ba de rnams nyed re re
T03D3794:173b-17: zhing 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang
T03D3794:173b-18: zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i
T03D3794:173b-19: dbye bas phung po rnam pa bzhi nyid do //
T03D3794:173b-20: de ni grangs bzhin du zhes bya ba 'jig rten
T03D3794:173b-21: pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir 'jig rten

T03D3794:173b-23: yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa ste /
T03D3794:173b-24: 'phags pa'i skye bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3794:173b-25: bdag tu lta ba'i gnyen po ma yin pa nyid
T03D3794:173b-26: kyis na 'jig rten pa nyid yin pa'i phyir zag
T03D3794:173b-28: bdag tu lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3794:173b-29: bdag tu lta ba'i gnyen po nyid yin pas na
T03D3794:173b-30: der lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste
T03D3794:173b-31: / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa
T03D3794:173b-32: dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med
T03D3794:173b-33: / pa ste bzhi'o // rgyu'i lhan cig byed pa

T03D3794:220b-13: de rnams ji snyed yod pa grangs de snyed kyi
T03D3794:220b-14: sangs rgyas gang yin pa de rnams la mchod pa
T03D3794:220b-15: ni yid dga' ba skyed par byed pa'o //

T03D3794:221a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa gsum mo //

T03D3794:221a-34: // ba'i phyir ro // pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3794:221a-35: de'i kun bsdus pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pa
T03D3794:221a-36: re re la sbyin pa la sogs pa thams cad

T03D3794:221b-15: nges pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum po

T03D3794:247b-5: rnam par grol ba ci srid pa'i gnas skabs su

T03D3794:247b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyi don la nges pa'i ye shes so //
T03D3794:247b-11: phyin ci ma log pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i
T03D3794:247b-12: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su

T03D3794:247b-16: sku la sogs pa gsum rnam par dag pas log

T03D3794:247b-18: / gang lus la sogs pa ma dag par gyur

T03D3794:247b-20: / ste / gzhan gyis yongs su shes shing kun

T03D3794:247b-29: chos kyi sku'i gnas skabs su slob dpon rnams kyis
T03D3794:247b-30: log par rtogs pa mang du yod do zhes bstan

T03D3794:247b-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa dang /

T03D3794:248a-1: la sogs pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa don gcig ste /
T03D3794:248a-2: ngo bo nyid kyi sku kho na chos kyi sku nyid du 'chad do snyam mo //

T03D3794:248a-4: ni gzhan dag na re zhes bya ba la sogs

T03D3794:248a-6: bo nyid kyi sku la chos kyi sku dbye ba

T03D3794:248a-10: snang ba skyed pa zhes bya ba gdul bya rnams

T03D3794:248a-28: sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul nyid yin par mtshungs na
T03D3794:248a-29: yang 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i sems dang sems las

T03D3794:248a-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa

T03D3794:248b-0: kyi sku de dag ni gcig tu smos @248b par
T03D3794:248b-1: rigs kyi ngo bo nyid la sogs pa'i sku las

T03D3794:248b-4: gzhan dag ni 'dir sku gsum po yang ji ltar yod /

T03D3794:248b-6: bzhi pa yang byang chub phyogs mthun zhes bya ba
T03D3794:248b-7: la sogs pa de ltar rnam par gzhag pa la
T03D3794:248b-8: gegs byed pa su zhig yod rigs su zin na

T03D3794:248b-12: bsgrub pa nyid snang ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3794:248b-13: gang yang ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i sgra'i mjug
T03D3794:248b-14: thogs su chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i sgra mi
T03D3794:248b-15: 'byung bas zhes gang smra ba de yang rigs pa

T03D3794:248b-17: ring na 'dug kyang de dang der //
T03D3794:248b-18: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ring po na 'dug pa
T03D3794:248b-19: nyid yin na yang ngo bo nyid dang chos kyi
T03D3794:248b-20: sku zhes 'brel par bya bar nus pa'i phyir ro
T03D3794:248b-21: // gzhan dag ni rgyu gsum gyi sku rnam pa bzhi yin par 'dod de /

T03D3794:248b-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i go rims kyis tshig
T03D3794:248b-29: le'ur byas pa'i ngor ye shes nyid kyis mdzad pa

T03D3794:248b-45: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T03D3794:248b-46: sangs rgyas smon gnas mkhyen pa ni //
T03D3794:249a-1: pa smon gnas mkhyen pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa dang 'grel pa ni go sla'o //

T03D3794:249a-10: pa'i thugs rje gang yin pa de ni thugs rje
T03D3794:249a-11: chen po'o // de'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi
T03D3794:249a-12: sku ni ye shes kyi sku gang yin pa ste
T03D3794:249a-13: chen po'o // / de la bzhugs pa ni de

T03D3794:249a-15: ltar te rnam pa gang gis /
T03D3794:249a-16: rtag tu ji ltar don mi mdzad //
T03D3794:249a-18: rgyu ni ma tshang med pa na //
T03D3794:249a-19: de la 'bras bu gang gis dgag / ces bya
T03D3794:249a-20: ba ni tshul gyis don gyi bya ba mdzad pa'i
T03D3794:249a-21: bcom ldan 'das dang don du gnyer ba dag yod
T03D3794:249a-22: pas rtag tu sems can rnams kyi mngon par 'dod
T03D3794:249a-23: pa'i don rdzogs par mdzad par rung ba nyid yin
T03D3794:249a-24: no zhes bya ba 'di la lan gdab pa'i phyir

T03D3794:249a-27: bya ba mdzad pa nyid du bstan par bya ba'i

T03D3794:249a-34: pa la mngon par phyogs pa brnyes par gyur nas

T03D3794:249a-44: mkhan po la sogs pa dang phrad pas des bstan

T03D3794:249b-10: bon te / dang por sangs rgyas la sogs pa

T03D3794:249b-14: gdul bya rnams la gang gi dus su zhes bya

T03D3794:249b-28: par don gyi bya ba mdzad pa yin no zhes

T03D3794:249b-30: dgongs pa brjod pas bshad ma thag pa'i don nyid

T03D3794:249b-35: bdag nyid chen po 'ga' zhig mya ngan las 'das

T03D3794:249b-37: phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu sprul pa des bka'
T03D3794:249b-38: stsal ba'i don rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ji ltar
T03D3794:249b-39: thams cad du khyab pa yin na yang sems can

T03D3794:249b-45: na bzhugs kyang 'bras bu ster bar mdzad par mi

T03D3794:250a-2: kyis nyes par spyad pa'i las kyi nyes pas bskyed
T03D3794:250a-3: pa gang yin pa la rgyu ma tshang bas zhes

T03D3794:250a-40: rgyu mtshan nyid ni rgyu grub pas zhes bya ba

T03D3794:250a-43: tshig le'ur byas pa dang 'grel pa ni go sla'o
